summary: A context-managed profiler that records execution times for selected function calls, code blocks, and iterable generation within a workflow. It uses system and threading trace hooks to capture call durations, aggregates results via an internal thread reading from a multiprocessing queue, and provides summary statistics in various formats.
business_intent: Enable developers to analyze and compare the relative time spent in different parts of a data processing pipeline, helping to locate performance bottlenecks across threads and processes.
